summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BluBridge HRMS Employee Management module. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend has critical React SelectItem component errors preventing form completion in add/edit employee flows.

ui_bugs.issue: React error: SelectItem must have a value prop that is not an empty string. This prevents form completion in Employment tab.
Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete employee creation/editing due to SelectItem component errors in Employment tab

passed_tests: Navigation to employees page from sidebar
Employee list display with correct stats cards (Total: 18, Active: 18, Inactive: 0, Resigned: 0)
Filter by department (Research Unit, Support Staff)
Add Employee button opens slide panel with 4 tabs (Personal, Employment, Organization, System)
Personal tab form fields (name, email, phone, gender, DOB)
Employee table display with all required columns
All backend CRUD APIs (31/31 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical React SelectItem component error in employee forms. The SelectItem components in Employment tab are throwing errors about empty string values, preventing form completion. This blocks the core employee add/edit functionality.
